rows.name:
Bonono thought Bonono about to get
eated by scary mystery monsters!

rows.label: qst003202_msg0003
rows.name:
But just when Bonono about to give up,
flashy Drivers appear from nowhere!

rows.label: qst003202_msg0005
rows.name:
Can friends help bash up nasty
monsters that try to hurt Bonono?
